name: Architect Partners LLC
tag_list: investment-bank, investment-banking, ma, mergers-and-acquisitions, advisor, ma-advisor, mobile, digital-media, internet
overview:
Architect Partners (“AP”) is an innovative mergers & acquisition advisory firm focused exclusively on the rapidly converging internet, mobile and digital media sectors.

Architect Partners supports its M&A advisory efforts by openly sharing observations, thoughts and insights via its information services products, known as AP Insights. AP Insights includes M&A Alert (comprehensive summary of sector M&A transactions), Buyer Viewpoints (insights into acquirers) and Sector Topology (organizational structure for the internet, mobile and digital media sectors).

Founded by industry veterans, AP provides seller advisory, corporate divestiture, buyer advisory and M&A related capital placement services to private and public corporate clients. www.architectpartners.com
